pyutil.dlink module¶

Symlink all of the files in one directory into another.

Double check that this is a directive. Usage:

`ln -s path/to/dest/* [path/to/src]`
pyutil.dlink.dlink(dest, src)[source]¶

Symlinks a directory from another one.

Utilize in an analogous way to Unix idiom ln -s path/to/dir/*

Parameters:
  • dest – The directory where the original files are located.
  • src – Optional argument indicating the directory where the symlinks

are to be created.

If the src argument isn’t provided, it is assumed that the current working directory is the src dir.

Returns:
None
